short_desc: Graduates gain a better understanding of strengths and weaknesses, as well as what is needed to gain successful employment
description: This is a one month evaluation tool and training program. Students of all skill levels can benefit from this course. Bootcamp is a semi-self paced class where students can proceed at the pace that is right for them. Daily one-on-one attention is given to every student to ensure they make the most of the course.Graduates gain a better understanding of strengths and weaknesses, as well as what is needed to gain successful employment.
